alert.note: Alert for North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cass County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sebeka, to near Verndale, to near Motley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pillager around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Poplar, Gull Lake and Backus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.
